===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[fundamental]]; [[basic]]; [[essential]]
#: {{zh-x|對 我 來說，我們 國家 的 根本 問題 是 我們 的 教學 系統。|''The way I see it, our country's '''basic''' problem is our education system.''}}

===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# [[at all]]; [[simply]]; [[absolutely]]
#: {{zh-x|他 根本 不 知道 從 哪裡 入手 找 工作。|''He has '''absolutely''' no idea how to start looking for work.''}}
#: {{zh-x|她 根本 就 沒有 童年。|''She didn't have any kind of childhood.''}}
# [[radically]]; [[thoroughly]]
#: {{zh-x|我 想 從 根本 解決 問題。|''I'd like to settle this problem '''once and for all.'''''}}

====Usage notes====
* The adverb in Sense #1 is almost always followed by a negative expression.

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[root]]; [[foundation]]; [[base]]; [[basis]]
#: {{zh-x|我們 應該 把握 問題 的 根本。|''We should get to the '''root''' of the problem.''}}
